questions.question: What does a red traffic light indicate?
questions.explanation: A red light always means stop.

questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond-shaped signs are used to warn drivers about upcoming hazards.

questions.question: If two cars reach a four-way stop at the same time, who has the right of way?
options: The car that is going straight
questions.explanation: At a four-way stop, the driver on the right has the right of way.

questions.question: What is the maximum speed limit on rural interstate highways in New Hampshire?
questions.explanation: The maximum speed limit on rural interstate highways in New Hampshire is 70 mph.

questions.question: When parallel parking, how far should your car be from the curb?
questions.explanation: When parallel parking, your car should be no more than 18 inches from the curb.

questions.question: When driving in fog, what should you do?
questions.explanation: In fog, you should turn on your low beams to increase visibility.
